Entries.Fri6: I was married, long ago. After my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} and I split, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} began flying around the countryside, cursing everything {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WitchGender}}}} saw.#$e#It's not a very mature way to express one's anger.

Entries.Thu10: You musn't tell anyone... but I have reason to believe that one of the locals is actually my daughter...#$e#I gave her up for adoption... Maybe someone have adopted her in this town.

BeforeMovie.Text: I sense an arcane power permeating this building tonight...

DuringMovie.Text: And to think... the layman has no idea that this is all raw, real footage!

AfterMovie.Text: For those aware of the esoteric mysteries, that had deep significance...
